TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WorkItemCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents the method that executes on a separate work item thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This delegate is passed to the <xref:System.Web.Util.WorkItem.Post%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and provides a callback method for the thread to which the work item is being posted.
